title: Lost in translation
snippet: Middle-aged American movie star Bob Harris is in Tokyo to film a personal endorsement Suntory whiskey ad solely for the Japanese market
synopsis: Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it's no exception for Riley, who is uprooted from her Midwest life when her father starts a new job in San Francisco. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her emotions - Joy (Amy Poehler), Fear (Bill Hader), Anger (Lewis Black), Disgust (Mindy Kaling).

title: The Fast and the Furious Tokyo Drift

title: Pacific Rim
snippet: urns out Pacific Rim didn't do that well in Japan after all

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
snippet: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma in Japan
